FIELD.NAME: HEADER-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message description.

FIELD.NAME: MESSAGE-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Message type identifier: REQ, RESP, or MSG

FIELD.NAME: MESSAGE-SUBTYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique message identifier, fixed for GMSEC Standard Messages

FIELD.NAME: MESSAGE-CLASS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Generic field for missions to classify their message set to aid message disposition.

FIELD.NAME: MISSION-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique mission name (e.g., MOONMAP, SUNSCAN, TEMPTRACK, etc)

FIELD.NAME: CONSTELLATION-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Used for constellations or satellite groupings

FIELD.NAME: SAT-ID-PHYSICAL
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An ID for the satellite that is fixed for its mission life

FIELD.NAME: SAT-ID-LOGICAL
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An ID for a single or group of satellites that can change during its mission life

FIELD.NAME: FACILITY
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A physical source (i.e. ACS Lab, CandDH String, etc.) generating the message, such as a spacecraft, remote site, etc.

FIELD.NAME: CLASS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: See table 4-21. Software Class and Subclass Categories in the GMSEC Interface Specification Document

FIELD.NAME: COMPONENT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of software application that produced the message (ex. APP1, CLIENT2, TAC3)

FIELD.NAME: SUBCOMPONENT1
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: First subsystem level within the component that produced the message

FIELD.NAME: SUBCOMPONENT2
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Second subsystem level within the component that produced the message

FIELD.NAME: ROLE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Role of the component is assigned in the configuration (Primary, Backup, Hot Backup, Secondary, Spare â€¦). Roles are dependent on the operational concepts being employed in the configuration

FIELD.NAME: CONTENT-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message content description

FIELD.NAME: UNIQUE-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Globally unique ID. API-generated tracking field.

FIELD.NAME: PUBLISH-TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time the message was published. API-generated tracking field.

FIELD.NAME: MW-INFO
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Container for information on the underlying middleware. Content is middleware specific. API-generated tracking field.

FIELD.NAME: CONNECTION-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique ID for each connection per process. API-generated tracking field.

FIELD.NAME: NODE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Actual device (host) generating the message. API-generated tracking field.

FIELD.NAME: PROCESS-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Application ID for Onboard Events or Process ID for Ground Events. API-generated tacking field.

FIELD.NAME: USER-NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Account name or owner of account that started the component.
